top.title: Sydney sends message of peace for New Year's after Bondi terror attack
top.summary: The words peace and unity were projected onto the Sydney Harbour Bridge as thousands gathered to watch the annual fireworks.

top.title: EU's top diplomat rejects Russian claims of Ukrainian attack on government sites
top.summary: It comes as Russia releases video which it claims shows a downed Ukrainian drone launched at one of Putin's residences.

top.title: Machu Picchu train crash leaves one dead and dozens injured
top.summary: A train driver died and at least 40 people were injured in the crash on the single-track line to Machu Picchu.

top.title: Meta buys Chinese-founded AI start-up Manus
top.summary: The tech giant wants to build into its own AI tools which do complex things with minimal interaction.

top.title: A wave paralysed me but AI could help me walk again
top.summary: Dan Richards, 37, from Swansea was injured in a freak accident on New Year's Eve in 2023.

top.title: China to crack down on AI firms to protect kids
top.summary: The draft regulations are aimed to address concerns around chatbots, which have surged in popularity in recent months.

title.#text: Net neutrality was back, until it wasn’t
Leaked video shows the Galaxy S26 Ultra’s new camera island
The Dreame X40 Ultra robovac is about $700 off, nearly matching its best price
